notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The study has been funded (Spanish Ministry of Economy, Industry, and Competitiveness) through a coordinated research project (hydroSOS mark), including the Universidad Miguel Hern√°ndez de Elche (AGL2016-75794-C4-1-R, hydroSOS foods) and the Universidad de Sevilla (AGL2016-75794-C4-4-R) (AEI/FEDER, UE).
